Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 WHERE LINFICHAACODI = :LINFICHAACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY LINFICHAADET2CODI ASC

INSERT INTO CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 ( LINFICHAADET2CODI, LINFICHAACODI, TRAMO, R, X, B, G, R0, X0, B0, G0, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :LINFICHAADET2CODI, :LINFICHAACODI, :TRAMO, :R, :X, :B, :G, :R0, :X0, :B0, :G0, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 SET LINFICHAACODI = :LINFICHAACODI, TRAMO = :TRAMO, R = :R, X = :X, B = :B, G = :G, R0 = :R0, X0 = :X0, B0 = :B0, G0 = :G0, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE LINFICHAADET2CODI = :LINFICHAADET2CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 ORDER BY LINFICHAADET2CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE LINFICHAACODI IN (SELECT LINFICHAACODI FROM CAM_T1LINFICHAA WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_T1LINFICHAADET2 WHERE LINFICHAADET2CODI = :LINFICHAADET2CODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY LINFICHAADET2CODI ASC
